message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $1200000. This is a significant opportunity, and I'm confident you'll see the potential it holds.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm not sure if it's worth the full $1200000 to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective. While $900000 is a good starting point, I believe the product's value justifies a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to come down to $1000000, recognizing your interest and to facilitate a quick and mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1000000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so my counteroffer is $950000. I think that's a fair price for the product.
